titleStmt.title: The true and perfect speech of Mr. James Guthrey, late minister of Sterling as it was delivered by himself immediately before his execution on June 1, 1661 at Edinbrough.
titleStmt.author: Guthrie, James, 1612?-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Sent from Edenburgh and printed for publick satisfaction and to prevent the dispersing of false copies,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: publick satisfaction and to prevent the dispersing of false copies
